faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: We resolve the most common doubts about our solution

item1.question: What happens to our current data during migration?
item1.answer: We guarantee 100% secure migration of all your data. Our team handles the transfer of medical records, patients and appointments without information loss. The process includes complete verification and security backup.

item2.question: How long does complete implementation take?
item2.answer: Basic implementation is completed in 24-48 hours. Team training takes 1 additional week. In total, in 2 weeks your center will be running 100% with the new system.

item3.question: Does the system work without internet?
item3.answer: Yes, our system has offline mode for basic queries and loads. When connection is restored, all data syncs automatically. You never lose information.

item4.question: Does it include integration with Argentine social security?
item4.answer: Completely. We have direct integration with +95% of the country's social security organizations. Automatic authorizations, electronic billing and real-time affiliate validation.

item5.question: What technical support is included?
item5.answer: 24/7/365 support with health-specialized technicians. Includes: installation, training, maintenance, updates and incident resolution. No additional costs.
